97a5-103b5 chos thams cad rdzogs pa chen po byang chub kyi sems su 'dus pa'i mdo sarba d+harmA a ti mahA/ bo dhi tsi ta su tra de nas 'dus pa'i tshogs chen de dag tham.d// ston pa kun tu bzang po'i spyan sngar// rab tu shin tu mdun pa'i sgo nas 'khod de// tham.d mgrin gcig pa'i sgo nas zhus pa// ston pa kun tu bzang pos ni// chos rnams kun tu snang bar mdzad// ston pa rdo rje sems dpa' des// don de rtsa ba gcig tu bstan// rtsa ba gcig gi don bstan pa// chos rnams kun gyi rtsa ba rtogs// zhes zhuso// de nas sems dpa' rdo rje des// chos thams cad rtsa ba gcig pa'i mdo dang// 'grel pa 'digsungso// chos kun rtsa ba gcig pa 'di lta ste// chos nyid sems nyid gcig tu bstan pa la// grangs dang rnam pa yongs kyis bgrang du med// ma bcos rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor pas// ti bya namkha'i lam la mkhas pa bzhin// mi rtog namkha' lta bur gnas par bya// rgyu rkyen ma byung rkyen med ma skyes pa'i// thams cad 'byung ba'i snying po byang chub la// yod pa'i sgros dang med pa'i skur pa dang// yin min sgro skur btags pa ga la yod// ces gsungso// ces byang chub kyi sems kyi mdo dang 'grel pa rdzogso 1 MWxxxka1Ixxx1

150b3-159b4 la zlo gsang ba'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i rgyud
byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos// blo thag gcad cing bstan pa gtad pa 'di gsungs so// kye sems dpa' chen po da nyon cig/ chos nyid byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin spros pa ni// byang chub sems ni blo yis bsams pa men// bsams shing brtags pa'i chos ni rigs byed ye shes yin// rang byung ye shes rang shar de la med pa na// blo yis bsams shing bsgoms pa'i chos la re ma 'jog/ chos rnams kun gyi thag ni byang chub semsu gcad// ma bltas ma bsgoms bsams pa med pas thag chod na// de la rang byung ye shes shar bas /thag der gcad// chos sku dmigsumed par sems dpas blo thag chod// 'dod yon longs sku yin par sems dpas blo thag chod// phan sems sprul sku yin par sems dpas blo thag chod// snang ba rang sems yin par sems dpas blo thag chod// sems la gnyisu med pas bag chags sbyang du med// yul med rang gsal yin par sems dpas blo thag chod// thig le nyag gcig sems kyi rang bzhin yin mod kyang// nyag gcig cir yang 'byung bas spong dang sgrub ma byed// kun kyang yon tan mnyam pas sems dpas blo thag chod// da ltar snang ba'i rgyu lus 'di kun sems dpas ji ltar dgongs// 'byung ba'i cho 'phrul tsam du sems dpas dgongs mdzod la// sems ni bla med namkha' lta bu blo thag chod// kye sems dpa' chen po da dgongs shig/ rtsa rgyud le'u lnga bcu rtsa bdun gsungs pa yang// rang byung ye shes tshig tu bstan pa'i mdo lung yin// sems las rang byung ye shes gcig tu la zlos cig/ phyi ma le'u bcu dang gnyisu gsungs pa yang// rang byung ye shes bsams pas btags pa yin// da yang rang byung gcig tu sems dpas la zlos gcig/ phyi ma'i phyi ma le'u bcu dang lnga ru gsungs pa yang// rang byung ye shes rnal 'byor 'jog pa yin// sems dpa' rang byung ye shes gcig tu la zlos cig/ thos pas ston pa'i lde mig dang// bsam pas grol ba'i lde mig dang// bsgoms pas 'byin pa'i lde mig gis// nges par gtan la phab pa na// sems dpas legs par thag chod cig/ sems dpa' chen po da dgongs cig/ la zlos gsang ba'i 'khor lo 'khor ba'i srog gcod 'di/ sems dpa' rdo rje khyod la 'di gtado// blo ldan skal ba can la 'di gsungs shig/ dam med gsong sdom chu skyur gdungs pa dang// srin po raks.a 'dre brdung mthu ngom dang// rtag tu grong kha yug pa'i glang rgan la// rdzogs ldan 'di 'dra'i dgongs pa mi bstan to// rgyud chen la zlos gsang ba'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba// dgongs pa klong nas shar ba'i mun sel rdzogs so// //'di thos sangs rgyas dgongs pa yin// 'di bsgom sangs rgyas dgongs pa thob// 'di bsgoms sangs rgyas dgongs pa gnas// e ma ho// bsam dgongs med par la zla ba'o// //ithi'// 1 MWxxxka1Ixxx1

159b4-165a6 chos thaMd byang chub kyi sems rdzogs pa chen po 'khor ba rtsad nas gcod pa namkha' dang mnyam pa yi ge med pa'i rgyud sarba d+harma mahA san+d+hi bo d+hi tsit+ta saM sa mU la tshed A kA sha sa ma na ak+Sa tan+t+ra de nas bcom ldan 'di skad gsungs// cir snang de bzhin nyidu cig/ 'di la bcos slad ma byed cig/ ma bcos mnyam pa'i rgyal po de// mi rtog chos sku'i dgongs par gnas// skye med lta ba stong pa nyid// kun khyab sgom pa gnyisu med// 'khrul spyod sems kyi rgyan du rol// rtog pa'i 'bras bu thig ler gcig/ dus gsum gcig la khyad par med// gtan tshigs bzhi ru gcig pa'i phyir// nga la byung zhing nga ru thim// nga yi rang bzhin 'od gsalo// e ma sems dpa' rdo rje che// namkha'imtha' ltar longs spyod pas// chos dbyings skye ba zad mi shes// bdud rtsi'i thig pa lce la zhog/ rgyal po btson du gzung pa dang// /gangs rtse nas ni brnyil ba ste// shing rta'i gzer 'og gcad par bya// namkha' ltar yi ge med pa'i rgyud// rang rig sems kyi dkyil du chongs// thugs rje ye shes rol par 'char// e ma kun bzang rgyal ba yab// ma 'dres yongs rdzogs zab cing yangs// namkha'lta bu'i rgyud bstan pa// ming tshig yi ge med bstan la// bstan du 'ong ba ci yi phir// bcom ldan kun bzang bka' stsal pa// mtshon du med pa'i chos nyid la// mtshon du med pa'i tshig brjod nas// mtshon pa'i tshig las rnam par grol// legso sem.da' rdo rje che// don dam yi ge med pa'i rgyud// khyod la gtado bde ba che// rang byung ye shes rgyas thob la// thig le nyag gcig ngang la zhog/ kun tu bzang po bde ba che// thig le chen po'i yi ge med// bya ba med pas rnam par grol// grol nas grol ba'i lam yang shar// kun rig sems la mngon par bstod// chos tham.d namkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa yi ge med pa'i rgyud// bcom ldan 'das kun rig rgyal pos gsungs pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po shri' sing ha dang// bod kyi lo tstsha ba bee ro tsa nas bsgyur ba'o// 1 MWxxxka1Ixxx1

165a6-172b2 chos thams cad byang chub kyi sems rdzogs pa chen po 'khor brtsad nas gcod pa rgya mtsho dang mnyam pa rnyogs pa med pa'i rgyud sarba d+harmaH mahA san+d+hi bo d+hi tsit+ta saM sa ra mU la tshe d+ha sa muN+Da sa man+ta na bi la tan+t+ra de nas bcom ldan 'di skad gsungs// e ma ho// sangs rgyas tham.d kyi// chos kyi dbyings ni yi ge med// rang bzhin 'od gsal yongsu dag/ namkha'i dbyings bzhin dri ma med// bdud rtsi dri med rgyu ldan mtsho// namkha' la nyi shar 'od zer lnga/ dbus na namkha' bzhi yi mthong// gting ni rin chen bcud gsum gter// bde gshegs mi mchod rang sems mchod// rang sems sangs rgyas yin pa las// sangs rgyas gzhan du mi btsal te// rig pa rang grol bya btsal bral// rang snang 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho 'di// dper na rmi lam lta bu ste// rmi lam bde sdug sna tshogs yang// gnyid sad dus na chos kyi sku// tshangs pa khyab 'jug la sogs bsgom// log pa'i lam du zhugs pa'o// namkha' lta bur sems 'gag pa// nyi tshe ba yi stong par lhung// mi gtsang keng rus la sogs bsgom// phyi yi sgrib pa can dang mtshungs// 'gog pa'i snyoms 'jug sgom byed pa// skye mched bzhi las thar lam med// phung po gtan tshigs gzhigs nas bsgom// de ka rtog par shes par gyis// lha dang dkyil 'khor zhal phyag bsgom// med par sgro yis /btags pa yin// rtsa rlung thig ler bde ba 'dzin// ro myags mngal gyi srin bu mtshungs// skad cig snang srid lha ru gsal// 'di ni rtsol ba'i nad du 'gyur// zhi gnas 'thibs po bsgoms byed pa// ma he glang dang khyad par med// gsal ba phyi nang med par sems// rnam rig pas kyang shin tu gsog/ kun yin gang ma yin sogs pa// a tir khas 'che mu stegs chos// rdzogs chen ris med bya btsal bral// rgya chad phyogs lhung med pa'i phyir// re shig rdzogs chen rol par mtshon// sems dpa' rdo rje khyod la gtad// sems dpa' chen po 'di lta ste// slob dpon snying ston gdams ngag thob// mtshams med gsum gyi rdzogs sangs rgyas// pha ma bsad pa'i 'bras bu gter// lta bas dmyal ba shin tu che// snang ba thams cad rdzun la ma khyer// ci spyod mo sham bu bzhin spyod// 'khor ba'i chos la chags pa skyed// bya lam khamsu gcig tu gdod// 'gro drug magtod. sem.n gnyis// sprul sku dmyal ba'i gnasu 'gro/ gangga''i chu dang se na'i mtsho// khyod kyi rtag tu bsres la 'thung// yum gyi bha ga rtag tu ltos// btsun mo des kyang me long ston// ldem po dgongs pa ma go bar// sgra bzhin spyad na log pa'i lam// rdo rje sems dpa'i dpa' bo ce// 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung dang// dus gsum 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas rnams// ting 'dzin rgya mtsho 'di las byung// dus gsum 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas rnams// rba rlabs med pa'i mnyam nyid mtsho// rnyog ma med pa'i dri med chu// gdod nas dag pa'i bdud rtsi 'dis// khams gsum 'khor ba'i dri ma khrus// de nas sems dpa' rdo rje yis// chedu ston pa 'di brjodo// kun rig thugs kyi dpal be'u nas// zab mo bdud rtsi lta bu'i chos// chos nyid byin rlabs rol pa yis// rnyogs med rgya mtsho'i klong ston pa// mnyam nyid rgya mtsho lta bu yis// kun tu bzang po mngon par bstod// chos tham.d rgya mtsho mtha' dang mnyam pa rnyog ma med pa'i rgyud las// bcom ldan 'das kun rig rgyal pos gsungs pa rdzogso// //rgya gar gyi khan po shri' singha dang// bod kyi lo tstsha bee ro tsa nas bsgyur ba'o

172b3-178a3 chos thams cad byang chub kyi sems rdzogs pa chen po 'khor ba rtsad nas gcod pa nyi zla dang mnyam pa dri ma med pa'i rgyud sarba d+harmAH mahA' san+d+hi bo d+hi tsit+ta saM sa ra mU la ts+tshe da sUrya tsan+d+ra sa ma ta a ma la tan+t+ra de nas bcom ldan 'di skad gsungs// namkha' klong yangs gdal ba'i dbyings// ye shes nyi zla 'khor ba gcod// mdo rgyas lta bsgoms spyod 'bras dang// thugs rje'i chen po lhun gyis grub// rig pa mtha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud// nyi zla lta bur dri ma med// sgron ma 'bar bas gti mug sel// drug gis 'gro drug g.yangs sa spyad// ston pa bstan pa gnas 'khor dus// rang snang sems la smras pa yin/ lta bsgom spyod 'bras bzhi yi rgyud// gdul bya'i skabs dang sbyar bar bya// mkha' gsal nyi zla lta bu yis// don dam dri ma med pa'i rgyud// rgyud do cog gi rgyal po 'di// sems dpa' rdo rje khyod la gtad// de nas sems dpa' rdo rje yis// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad bstod// /mnyam nyid rgyal po lha yi lha// skye med rang byung chen po'i ngang// mkha' 'dra ye shes gdal ba'i klong// dus gsum rgyal ba kun gyi yab// tham.d mkhyen pa phyag 'tshal bstod// de nas sems dpa' rdo rje dang// sku gsum ye shes lnga la sogs pa rang snang rig pa'i 'khor tham.d dga' zhing mgu nas// rjesu yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstodo// chos tham.d rig pa nyi zla mtha' dang mnyam pa dri ma med pa'i rgyud// bcom ldan 'das kun rig rgyal pos gsungs pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po shri singha dang/ bod kyi lotstsha ba bee ro tsa nas bsgyur ba'o 1 MWxxxka1Ixxx1

178a4-184b7 chos thams cad byang chub kyi sems rdzogs pa chen po 'khor ba rtsad nas gcod pa rin po che dang mnyam pa skye ba med pa'i rgyud sarba dharmAH mahaA san+d+hi bo d+hi tsit+ta saM sa ra mU la ts+tshe da mahA rat+na sa man+ta a nud pa ton+t+ra de nas bcom ldan 'di skad gsungs// e ma rdo rje sems dpa' che// rmad byung bcu gsum skyemedon// 'khor ba rtsad nas gcod pa'i chos// 'di ma shes pa ngal ba'i lam// 'di don rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor dang// gang ltar spyad kyang bde chen klong// rdzogs chen a ti bstan pa 'di// mi nub nub par mi 'gyuro// don la 'gyur ba med pa 'dir// yid bzhin nor bu rgyal mtshan rtse// rmad byung rin chen za ma tog/ don dam skye ba med pa'i rgyud// rigs lnga bde gshegs byang chub sems// rdo rje sems dpa' mchog gi lam// kun bzang thugs kyi bcud btigs pa// sems dpa' rdo rje khyod la gtad// blo yi padmo kha phye la// snying gi dkyil du bsgom par gyis// de nas sems dpa'i rdo rje dang// rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas byang chub sems// mgon po tshogs dang bcas pa yis// ma skyes spros bral kun tu bzang// rin chen sgron mas gti mug sel// rmad byung rgyal ba kun gyi yab// rdo rje 'chang chen rigs lnga'i gtso// kun rigs rgyal po tham.d mkhyen// mnyam pa'i rgyal po phyag 'tshal bstod// de bzhin nyid la rtag tu 'dud// ye shes rgyal por mngon par bstod// chos thams cad rin po che dang mnyam pa skye ba med pa'i rgyud// bcom ldan 'das kun rig rgyal pos gsungs pa rdzogso// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po shri' singha dang// bod kyi lo tstsha ba bee ro tsa nas bsgyur ba'o 1 MWxxxka1Ixxx1
